articles.title: Pope to comedians: Help us to dream of a better world - Vatican News - English
articles.description: Pope Francis meets with more than 100 comedians from around the world, encouraging them to cheer people up and help people see reality with all its contradictions.
articles.content:
By Christopher Wells
Comedians are among the most well-loved and applauded entertainers, Pope Francis said on Friday morning, because they have and cultivate the gift of making people laugh.
With s… [+2404 chars]
